name: Evorage
description:
IMPORTANT: This game is meant to be slow and relaxing and definitely to be put in the background to return to later. A short relaxing farming game that is still in development

Type "Help" for the basic controls, and "Advanced" for advanced controls.

Game backstory:

A village didn't appease their rain god enough and so it got angry at them! It sent floods of rain speeding up the river so much they aren't able to use it, plant trees to slow the river down in order for them to be saved.

Plant plants to harvest and sell for coins to buy feed and equipment to grow your tree, while maintaining a good level of sacrificing to keep the rain god happy. The rains emotions can be told through the intensity of the rain :)

Have fun :)
